instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1398 820-00163-A loop
threads.message:
Hi,

I have an A1398 820-00163-A that keeps rebooting on the Apple logo. With the trackpad disconnected, It goes to the login screen.
I´ve already replaced the keyboard, trackpad and cable, but with the same result, witch seams to indicate that is something related with the board.

PPBUS_S4_TPAD diode reading is 0.529.

PPBUS_S4_TPAD = 12.5V

Can you help?

threads.title: A1398 820-00163-A loop
threads.message:
Check with known good battery and original 85W Magsafe 2 charger.
Also test with external macOS.

Same thing happens booting into safe mode?
No errors pop up into diagnostic mode?
